QuestData.Title: Lost Necklace
QuestData.Description: I lost my necklace and I think that guttersnipe Billy Maclure took it! He's usually scuttling like a rat around the Maclure Vineyards east of here. $B$BGet my necklace back for me and you'll warm an old widow's heart.
QuestData.RewardText: You lost a what? Well I didn't take no necklace, because I ain't no thief!$B$BI might know who did but...<grin>...I'm too hungry to remember.
